name: 芮嘉瑋
objective:
本課程主要介紹稀土元素在化工、生物科技、生醫工程、綠色能源、光電半導體、奈米科技、環境工程等諸多領域中的應用。除此，並探討台灣發展稀土產業因應對策。
This course mainly introduces the application of rare earth elements in chemical industry, biotechnology, biomedical engineering, green energy, optoelectronic semiconductor, nanotechnology, environmental engineering and many other fields. In addition, countermeasures for the development of Taiwan's rare earth industry will also be discussed.
schedule:
Course Syllabus
1 week：Introduction to Rare Precious Metals 介紹稀貴金屬
2 week：Rare earths are the top priority 稀土是重中之重
3 week：The world's largest rare earth mining country 世界第一稀土礦產大國
4-9 weeks：Group discussion on the applications of rare earth elements in various fields of science and technology 稀土的多元科技應用
10-15 weeks：Insight into the application and importance of rare earth materials from patent documents 從專利看稀土材料的應用與重要性
16-17 weeks：Countermeasures to strengthen the risk management of rare earth supply chain 強化稀土供應鏈風險管理的因應對策
18 week：Final Report 期末報告
scorePolicy:
出席與學習態度 30%
